title: HedgeFx
author: HedgeFx
content: Hallo,A friend of mine have 7000 pi network. Is there someone interested in buy it?If so pm me your offer.

comments.author: Yurkov
comments.body: Quote from: HedgeFx on June 30, 2023, 08:52:50 PMHallo,A friend of mine have 7000 pi network. Is there someone interested in buy it?If so pm me your offer.As far as I know, in order to be able to make Pi Network token transfers, owner must pass a full KYC for the coins to be transferred from the internal network to the Pi main net. If this condition is met, then there is a problem of determining the price, because in fact, at the moment Pi Network tokens are worthless. I say this as a holder of around 1k Pi tokens.I'm afraid there's no point in selling them now, because if anyone makes an offer at all, it will be pennies. It's better to wait for Pi Network to enter some exchange.But.. considering everything I've written above, I can offer $7 for 7000 worthless (at the moment) Pi Network tokens.

Is there someone interested in buy it?If so pm me your offer.this pi network is been a while for couple years, even i saw people in here using cloths from pi network, which is red flag to me, how normal people became pi supporterÂ  i thought its been on exchange, its been to long without any market mediation, would considering something wrong on their project

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: Quote from: HedgeFx on June 30, 2023, 08:52:50 PMHallo,A friend of mine have 7000 pi network. Is there someone interested in buy it?If so pm me your offer.As far as I concern, pi is not a good coin to invest. i had been hearing this gor a couple of years and yet still there is listing happen in any of the exchange that pi list in this field of business here in cryptocurrency. So making a transaction to buy this coin is more high risk.And as far as I know also that majority of the community here kqnew that pi was one of shitty coins to hold and to buy it.

comments.author: inanilujimi
comments.body: Quote from: HedgeFx on June 30, 2023, 08:52:50 PMHallo,A friend of mine have 7000 pi network. Is there someone interested in buy it?If so pm me your offer.1 pi 0.24.Does your friend still have it?7000 x 0.24 = 1680We can make transactions of 100 pi per transaction.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: HedgeFx on June 30, 2023, 08:52:50 PMHallo,A friend of mine have 7000 pi network. Is there someone interested in buy it?If so pm me your offer.First Verify is the Pi he has is in a verified account, kyc compliant and if its been released or its just mined. Also understand that there are chances that the coin might not be what it preched to be, hence, he should ensure he's not expecting too much from it, he should also look around for local p2p merchants who buys it and sell to them but at a very cheap rate.

comments.author: oniex
comments.body: Be careful with what you're saying... the price you see 0.24$ or 0.30$ + is irrelevant, because you can't deposit PI to any of the exchanges you see those prices from, therefore currently it's impossible to sell it and once it will be possible the price won't be so high... i would say it will be around 0.0001$ per token if not less.So do your due dilligence before you send any money to anyone selling PI.RegardsQuote from: inanilujimi on October 20, 2023, 06:48:15 AMQuote from: HedgeFx on June 30, 2023, 08:52:50 PMHallo,A friend of mine have 7000 pi network. Is there someone interested in buy it?If so pm me your offer.1 pi 0.24.Does your friend still have it?7000 x 0.24 = 1680We can make transactions of 100 pi per transaction.

comments.author: 2Pizza410000BTC
comments.body: Quote from: HedgeFx on June 30, 2023, 08:52:50 PMHallo,A friend of mine have 7000 pi network. Is there someone interested in buy it?If so pm me your offer.Pi Network tokens are currently worthless. No one is interested in buying these worthless coins. Even then no one is allowed to transfer this pi network token if no one is allowed then how can he transfer and sell his pi token? I also have Pi Token but it is worthless that's why I am not telling anyone to buy this Pi Token. But since you have been patient for a long time, please be more patient, I hope to be listed with a good price.
